hero.title: Smart SMS and AI Automation for E-commerce
hero.description: Automate SMS notifications, connect with customers in real-time, and streamline your operations effortlessly.

smsDemo.title: Experience Our SMS Services
smsDemo.description: Try our different SMS services and see how they can help your business grow

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.description: Keep customers informed about their package location and estimated delivery time.
tracking.inputLabel: Enter your phone number to receive a tracking update

delivery.title: Delivery Updates
delivery.description: Notify customers when their order is out for delivery with driver contact information.
delivery.inputLabel: Enter your phone number to receive a delivery update

retargeting.title: SMS Retargeting
retargeting.description: Re-engage customers with personalized promotional messages and offers.
retargeting.inputLabel: Enter phone numbers (comma-separated) for bulk messaging

smsDemo.disclaimer: By submitting, you agree to receive a one-time demo message. Standard message rates may apply.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.description: Get the tokens you need to power your SMS communications

enterTrackingNumber: Enter your tracking number to get real-time updates
deliveryIssuesMessage: There have been issues with delivering your package. Please check the timeline below for more details.

statusDescriptions.in-preparation: Your package is being prepared for shipment.
statusDescriptions.transfer: Your package is being transferred between centers
statusDescriptions.distribution-center: Your package has arrived at a distribution center
statusDescriptions.en-route-to-region: Your package is en route to your wilaya
statusDescriptions.arrived-at-region: Your package has arrived in your wilaya
statusDescriptions.ready-for-pickup: Your package is ready for pickup
statusDescriptions.out-for-delivery: Your package is out for delivery
statusDescriptions.alert: There is an alert with your package
statusDescriptions.returning-to-center: Your package is being returned to the distribution center
statusDescriptions.returned-to-center: Your package has been returned to the distribution center
